title: Episode 184: Look How Happy We Are with Nichole Perkins
itunes:title: Episode 184: Look How Happy We Are with Nichole Perkins
itunes:subtitle: Kate puts on a face mask and uses a face vibrator and Doree wonders if night tennis will finally lead her to get contact lenses. Then, they welcome writer, poet, and podcast host Nichole Perkins to talk about her new book of essays Sometimes I Trip On ...
description:
Kate puts on a face mask and uses a face vibrator and Doree wonders if night tennis will finally lead her to get contact lenses. Then, they welcome writer, poet, and podcast host Nichole Perkins to talk about her new book of essays Sometimes I Trip On How Happy We Could Be, how sex is self-care, and when she started to embrace femininity, sexuality, and wearing colors.


  • To leave a voicemail or text for a future episode, reach them at 781-591-0390. You can also email the podcast at forever35podcast@gmail.com.
  • Visit forever35podcast.com for links to everything we mention on the show.
  • Follow the podcast on Twitter (@Forever35Pod) and Instagram (@Forever35Podcast) and join the Forever35 Facebook Group (Password: Serums). 
  • Sign up for the newsletter! At forever35podcast.com/newsletter
